page.title: 20Stanway Flower Show
page.content:
{Stanway Flower Show}is held in August. It began in 1940 and has always been held in{Stanway House Grounds. }Mrs. Charteris is the main organiser of the Show. There are 17 people on the Show committee and 65 people help on the day. There are 119 categories and over 700 entries and the most unusual entry they have had is a vegetable model.Mr. Hughes judges the competitions. The prizes are money,cups and shields.They also have stalls like pick-a-straw, guess the weight of the cake, coconut shy,treasure hunt,skittles,tombola and roll-a-penny.The Bradford Silver Band play at the Show.Over 2000 people come to the Show every year and it earns about 700 for local causes.
{The information for this block was {compiled by the children of Didbrook {County Primary School. }
